page.title: 06VILLAGE LIFE IN BROADWAY.
page.content: If you drive along the main street of {Broadway}on a weekday evening it appears to be a typical, quiet, sleepy {Cotswold village.}You would not imagine much happens, but come daytime, especially at holiday time and weekends it is as full of visitors as a seaside resort, but these visitors are from all over the world. Many premises cater for them including gift shops and businesses specialising in locally made food and crafts. Residential premises abound, from 'Bed and Breakfast' to large hotels. Apart from their busy daily routines the residents of{Broadway}lead active social lives. There are a great many clubs and societies ranging from Cubs, Brownies, Guides and a Youth Club for teenagers to a thriving local Football Team, Young Farmers, Toc H, Women's Institute and Darby and Joan.
